content: ** see the blaze hat pattern here 1 ** drops design pattern no ai-008-bn yarn group c or a + a ----------------------------------------------------------- for the whole set there will be enough with approx 50-100-100-100 g drops air ----------------------------------------------------------- ************************************************** **neck warmer ** sizes 2 - 3/4 - 5/8 - 9/12 years circumference top approx 40-42-45-49 cm height approx 12-14-16-18 cm materials drops air from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 50 g for all sizes in colour 03 pearl grey the piece can also be knitted with yarn from alternative yarn yarn group c see the link below drops circular needle 40 cm size 5 mm or the size needed to get 17 stitches and 22 row stocking stitch on 10 cm in width and 10 cm in height drops circular needle 40 cm size 4 mm for rib 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/s30-4-a-blaze-hat
